article_text: Is now the right time to sell the farm? If you are a landowner nearing or just past retirement age, this might be the perfect time to consider selling, said Bill Gaughan, local broker with Farmers National Company.

article_metadata.title: Farmers National seminar will help farmers decide whether to sell land | The Kansas City Star
